name: A Fairy Tale
description: Sin descripción

name: Where Winter Crows Go
description: Would you risk living together with a stranger in an isolated cabin to avoid the freezing cold?

name: Cruis'n Exotica
description: Differences from the arcade version include different track layouts, the lack of fully licensed vehicles, and more hidden vehicles.

name: Gyakuten Touhou
description: Gyakuten Touhou is a visual novel & adventure style game based on the Gyakuten Saiban/Ace Attorney series. The player assumes the role of Aya Shameimaru as a defense attorney as she proves her clients not guilty using investigation, evidence, and cross-examination.

name: Gyakuten Touhou 3
description: Sequel of the Ace Attorney parody game Gyakuten Touhou with 5 new cases.

name: Cruis'n World
description: Features exclusive to the Nintendo 64 include a new Moon track, a few new modes and some of the vehicles being renamed.

name: Gyakuten Touhou: Zoukan Gou
description: A side-game from Suicaya-san's series of Ace Attorney-like games, Gyakuten Touhou.

name: Gyakuten Touhousai
description: A side-game from Suicaya-san's series of Ace Attorney-like games, Gyakuten Touhou.

name: Samurai Shodown III
description: The Game Boy version of Samurai Showdown III lacks Kyoshiro Senryo and Gaira Caffeine, but adds Jubei Yagyu back to the roster as a hidden final boss exclusively for the said version. There are also exclusive features that come from using the Super Game Boy.
Sin descripción

name: Planetaries
description: A sci-fi open world survival adventure. Set in a time when humanity has expanded its reach beyond the confines of Earth, immerse yourself in a rich galaxy. Craft, build, mine, trade, explore, and fight your way through a universe brimming with endless possibilities.

name: Rogue Light Deck Builder
description:
Rogue Light Deck Builder is a digital wooden board game.

Your house needs a deck. You have a hammer. You have wood and you have nails. The light outside is faulty. You work, you earn. Freedom is $1,000,000.

Build a deck. Use your hammer. Drive the nails in. Scrimp and save. Freedom is just around the corner.

name: Smiterino
description:
Smiterino is a League of Legends training tool that helps players improve their precision at last-hitting with smite.

With Smiterino, you will be able to contest objects at a rate much higher than standard gaming offers. Junglers training with this APP are much more prepared when it comes to secure or stealing Dragons and Barons.

All rounds are taken from real LoL ranked matches of tier Diamond I, Master or Challenger. Currently, there are 130 different rounds

name: Strange Toilet: The Forgotten Shit
description: In the quiet neighborhood where Nathan and Sarah live, there is an ominous presence. A potential threat from a murderer on the loose. The residents did not expect that on this peaceful evening, they would be confronted with a grim reality they never anticipated

name: Squishy Pastries
description: The goal of Squishy Pastries is to get as high of a score as possible by combining pastries of the same type. The larger the pastry, the more points for combining it. Each of the pastries is a soft body, so they are squishy. If any of the pastries leave the wooden box for more than 5 seconds, the game is over!

name: Mega Man: The Rulers of Space
description: Sin descripción

name: Casa dos Ossos
description:
In a not too distant future...

Robin Chavez is an astronaut on a mission. She is tasked with mapping and cataloging the planets of a newly discovered galaxy, a fact that has shaken life on Earth. To tell you the truth, her mission has been a success. There's only one planet left, named TauCeti-75.

..but not everything works out. As it approaches the planet, Robin's ship short circuits and slowly loses power, until crash-landing on the unknown planet. With her ship out of operation, Robin finds herself alone with Nieborg, her little robot helper. What will she do now? Well, find out playing the game!

name: Astra
description: Welcome to Astra, your ticket to the stars. This Mixed Reality Experience transports you from Earth to the deepest corners of the cosmos as you embark on a quest to uncover the key ingredients of life in the Universe. Step foot on planets and their dark moons in a search for future worlds and far away beings.

name: Batman
description: An enhanced port for the Amstrad GX4000 of the Amstrad CPC version of Batman.

name: Burnin' Rubber
description: Amstrad GX4000 port of Burnin' Rubber.

name: Alone in the Dark
description: The PS2 and Wii version of Alone in the Dark is a completely different game from the Xbox 360 and PC version. Level structure, mechanics of gameplay and looks of the characters sometimes differ strongly as these versions contain concept elements that were left out of the other game.

name: Ifrit
description: A freeware shmup created by Zac Station with 3 stages. After beating all stages, the game loops with increasing difficulty.

name: Maimaimai Goen
description: Maimaimaigoen is a multidimensional story about the "growing pains of the heart" of 16 children and their nursery school teachers. It examines each person as an individual and accompanies them through the difficulties of living in today's world.

name: Z.A.P.
description: Zzzzzz zzz zzzz ZOMBIES! Protect your fortress from the onslaught of zombies headed your way. Put each zombie at peace. Stop zombies attacking people. You can't rest until all zombies are perished!

name: Put Up
description: You control the main character who has to take the red ball. When you insert the red ball into the hole in the wall, an exit appears. Once the hero enters there, the level is considered passed. There are a total of 15 levels. The game ends when you complete the last level. To open the chest with a question mark, climb onto the chest and press the down button. There are also secret brick blocks that open in the same way. The hero's lives increase by one for every 20,000 points.

name: Jet Set Steamboat Willie
description: 2024 sees Steamboat Willie entering the Public Domain and the 40th anniversary of Jet Set Willy. To celebrate this milestone, Sloanysoft is proud to present a wee tribute to these classics for you to enjoy on your ZX Spectrum.

name: Maeve's Academy
description: Maeve's Academy is a sandbox-style visual novel game in which players assume the role of the the first man to step into the magical realm, attending H.G. Academy alongside his childhood best friend.

name: Mystery of the Capsmith
description: Sin descripción

name: Hart's Toil
description:
Hart's Toil is a puzzle-adventure game inspired by the cruel game design of La Mulana and NES games. Solve 2-4 hours worth of puzzles and collect items that will allow you to solve more puzzles. Defeat the witches of the underground to gain the materials needed for a ritual that will let you escape hell.

The mechanics of the game are simple. You can move in 4 directions, interact with things in front of you, and use items in your bag. The environment and roaming creatures can damage you, and you will die if your HP reaches zero. Some items may require MP to function, specially items used to kill enemies.

The puzzles are mean and intentionally obscure. It is recommended that you play along with a friend sitting by your side and solve the puzzles together.

name: Fantastic Marchen: Cake-ya-san Monogatari
description: Sin descripción

name: Rock 'n Roll
description:
Your task is to guide the ball through a total of 32 levels. The path is stipulated, but also watch out for rumours giving tips regarding secret short-cuts.

Fundamentally there are two things which you must beware of in order to reach the finish unscathed: Firstly certain obstacles will deduct energy from your ball and secondly the ball must not be all-owed to fall into the precipice.

The world is constituted of 7 continents, each having it’s particular peculiarities. Each has it’s own signature tune and landscape.

name: Across the Abyss: Voidborn
description: Enemies are your best weapon in this mix of Vampire Survivor and Hades! Slash and throw probes at bio-engineered foes, while meeting quirky characters and wielding elemental powers against an evil galactic mega corp. Get stronger, go further, and conquer the chaos!

name: TriMatch
description: TriMatch, the addicting puzzle challenge where you must match colorful triangles to score big and conquer each level! Strategize and align triangles based on their colored sides to rack up points and unlock the next level. Dive into the world of TriMatch for an addictive and brain-teasing experience that will keep you coming back for more!

name: Dark Discoveries
description: In this chilling horror experience, immerse yourself in the eerie confines of a desolate house consumed by anomalies set loose by a devastating virus. Equipped with only a camera and flashlight, your sole objective is to document evidence of these sinister aberrations while navigating the looming threat of their lethal grasp. Prepare for spine-tingling encounters around every corner, where each photograph captured could mark your demise. Will you unravel the origins of the virus before succumbing to its sinister machinations, or will you become yet another casualty swallowed by the abyss? This game combines elements of horror and puzzle-solving, promising a gripping and immersive journey into darkness.

name: Last Cat
description: A cozy puzzle game. Lead the cat through various mazes with different difficulties.

name: Ellia
description:
"ELLIA" is a premium rhythm game that weaves captivating stories into its gameplay.

Experience breathtaking visuals and superb UI/UX, complemented by a carefully curated soundtrack of original music from Arcstar. Dive into the rhythm and play today!

name: Summer Games II
description: The ZX Spectrum port of Summer Games II sports different graphics due to hardware limitations

name: Second-Loop
description: Second-Loop is a single-player FPS action game with sandbox physics puzzle solving, — you're the robot pilot in the heart of a futuristic dystopian world. Control your mech in intense combat, and use your ability to manipulate gravity + assemble mechanical parts to solve physics puzzles.

name: Matematik i Måneby
description: A math-based game, targeted towards kids between the ages of 7-14

name: Life Simulator 2017
description:
LS2k17 is a historical game in which you are propelled into the France of a very distant era, in 2017.

Thanks to its super-powerful game engine and breathtaking graphics, you'll enjoy a unique, breathtaking experience.

In this ultra-realistic simulator, you'll be free to do absolutely anything you want. You can relax, work or even save the world! LS2k17 is your new life.

(Warning: the game is played entirely in the Windows console and may require Internet Explorer or something similar)

name: Zelda 64: Shifting Sand Dungeon
description: A mod which transforms Shifting Sand Land from Super Mario 64 into a dungeon in The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time.

name: Hazy Maze Temple
description: A mod which turns Hazy Maze Cave from Super Mario 64 into a Temple in The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time.

description: Sin descripción

name: Kirby 64: Whispy's Trials
description: Sin descripción

name: Game of Vampires: Twilight Sun
description: Live as a vampire lord in Game of Vampires, an epic and enigmatic RPG saga! Take Dracula's castle, sit on the throne and rule over a secret kingdom filled with famous vampires, werewolves, and witches. Meet powerful and handsome immortals, make alliances with other vampires, and clash with fairytale monsters! You are the lord of twilight... so what will you do in the shadows?

name: Land94
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario's Point and Click 64
description: Sin descripción

name: Lug's Tiny Torture
description: Sin descripción

name: Lug's Tiny Torture Lite

name: Silly Little Guys
description: A Simple 2D platformer where the player plays as a kid going through 2 levels with a bubble gun, shooting at the workers to make them "silly". The game focuses on "sillying" a set number of workers in each area, with minor side paths to encourage exploration and creative use of enemies.

name: Multi's Going Out
description: Sin descripción

name: Race Drivin' (SA-1 Enhanced Version)
description: Sin descripción

name: Dejig: Aqua World
description: A jigsaw puzzle simulator themed around aquatic animals and oceanic scenes.

name: Super 10 VR Bundle
description: Prepare to be entertained! The developers behind 10 of the most popular and highest-rated VR titles have joined together to offer this convenient and cost-effective one-stop shop. The Super 10 VR Bundle will immerse you in a variety of exciting VR worlds that all have one crucial thing in common: they’re super fun to play.

name: Crazy Wife
description: Your wife locks you in the basement of the house and you have to find a way to escape the house without getting caught by her while doing the objectives to escape.

name: Arishia Tale
description: Immerse yourself in an exciting anime-style metroidvania, where each skill unlocks new areas and secrets on the vast map. Face powerful bosses, acquire unique abilities, and uncover hidden mysteries in this ever-evolving world, all with traditional anime-inspired animation.

name: Sundy Stairway
description: Join Sunday, a 14-year-old boy who moves with his family to Calendar Town, where mysterious deaths and suicide cases seem to occur. Tragedy will come when one of his relatives is found dead in his home. Help Sunday to discover the mysteries of this town in this visual novel rpg with dreamcore and aesthetic style.

name: Rich School Girl Simulator
description:
Rich School Girl Simulator: High School Life Days
Do fun with a rich high school girl game at the school life girl fashion games.
Enjoy your school life days in rich high school girl simulator game to do fun.
We will explain the life of a rich school girl who take admission in high school for his bright future in high school simulator. For this reason, she will not follow the high school rules and resolutions in popular rich girls in the high school. A rich girl on their first day at high school, she will go to the classroom for taking first lectures in the virtual high school girl simulator game.

name: SakiMizu Life
description: Sin descripción

name: Kindergarten 3
description: Kindergarten 3 is the long awaited threequel to the Kindergarten series! Explore a new school with old and new friends...and new ways to get ruthlessly murdered.

name: Pokémon Odyssey
description:
This is a crossover project between Pokémon, Made in Abyss, and Etrian Odyssey. It’s a sort of dungeon-crawler story-driven, , but you don’t need to know anything about Etrian Odyssey or Made in Abyss in order to fully enjoy this game!

On the island of Talrega lies the entrance to the Yggdrasil labyrinth, a gigantic desert carved from the roots of the tree of life over millennia; filled with treasures and other valuable items, it attracted explorers from everywhere. What are you looking for? Fame? Money? Or do you just want to test your coaching skills by tackling the maze? What’s at the end?

name: Pokémon Crown
description:
Pokémon Crown is an entirely new gameplay experience. While it is still an exploration-focused RPG, we have combined many elements from other genres to create something truly unique. In Pokémon Crown, you will rediscover each Pokémon and how they interact with one another using our new Auto Chess battle engine! Play against interesting and unique teams while strategizing on synergy, placement, and type matchups! 6v6 combat like you’ve never seen before!

Pokémon Crown is a Medieval RPG set in the vast and magical Region of Guelder. Guelder, as a rich resource bastion, was thrust into a long-lasting war. Guelder triumphed after many years, but not without a cost… While the region was rebuilding, the King’s Diviner predicted a dual prophecy for the kingdom: a future of light and a future of darkness. Based on these visions, the King realized that unless something changed, the kingdom was doomed to more war.

name: SpongeBob Adventures: In A Jam
description: Get Ready to go on an Amazing Adventure with SpongeBob and his Friends! Plankton’s latest scheme to steal the secret Krabby Patty Formula has backfired in a big way, leaving the world covered in JellyFish Jam! Now it’s up to you and SpongeBob, along with friends new and old to rebuild and restore order to Bikini Bottom and Beyond!

name: Yowie
description: You just crashed your car in the remote Australian wilderness. You are injured and being stalked by a murderous Yowie. Will you escape with your life or fall like so many before you to the monster?

name: Shrouded Space
description: After ten long years of solitary confinement on the Empress Xyra's prison planet, you have just been summoned for a special work detail. Could this finally be the opportunity you have been looking for to escape and put all this behind you?

name: Suboptimal
description: Suboptimal is a small horror Point & Click adventure game where you must escape the submarine you are commanding, one way or another...

name: Frontier Fugitive
description:
America, 1876, you are the infamous gunslinger Ben Blake, somewhere in the wild west.

You escaped the shootout at Bodie after killing the towns crime boss and now you're on the run from both outlaws and the law alike. Can you loot, shoot, escape and triumph against all odds to become the perfect Frontier Fugitive?

name: Deme Game
description: A fangame made for a twitch streamer and vtuber deme. Currently in early development since February 2023.

name: Gulliver in the Land of Giants
description:
Gulliver in the Land of Giants is a Russian educational game based on the second part of Jonathan Swift's satirical masterpiece best known as "Gulliver's Travels".

The game contains several modes:
- Animated audio book.
- Game (Boy or Girl), 2 different kind of games depending on which gender chosen.
- English lessons for digits or colors.
- Painting book.
- Audio drama, which is the same as animated audio book but with no visuals.

name: ConversationalRumblings
description: A piece of Interactive Fiction made for Dialogue Jam.

name: Chatterbox
description: Introducing Chatterbox - the desktop chat app that brings back the simplicity of text-based communication. A piece of Interactive Fiction written for the 2024 Dialogue Jam.

name: Rabbids: Legends of the Multiverse
description: Sin descripción

name: Mite ha Ikenai
description:
Mite wa Ikenai is a Adventure video game published by Dimple Entertainment released on August 7th, 2008 for the DS.

The idea of the game is to find ghosts from the pictures displayed on the screen and exorcise them by tracing them with a touch pen.

name: Supra Mayro Kratt
description: Sin descripción

name: Mach K9
description: A physics, wave based roguelite where you smash aliens out of arena to defeat them and choose upgrades between waves.

name: Nitro Street Run 2
description: Nitro Street Run is back and bigger than ever! Relive your most exciting moments in all-new modes: Classic Race-Takedown-Escape the Cops-and Duels. The game is enhanced even more by a new upgrade system and totally revamped graphics. This is the sequel you've been waiting for!

name: Prison Loop
description: Embark on a journey of anomalies and repetition in "Prison Loop," a captivating indie puzzle game. Trapped in a mysterious temporal loop within a high-security prison, your objective is to observe anomalies throughout the environment.

name: Mother 4
description: Mother 4 follows the journey of three kids and the leader of a biker gang. With dark rumors of "Modern Men" running wild, these unassuming heroes set out to uncover the truth, no matter how dangerous. The game was based on the role-playing game series Mother. It was intended to emulate an official new installment to the series, but was rebranded into the original Oddity.

name: Uno Free Fall
description: Sin descripción

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach
description:
Five Nights at Freddy’s: Security Breach is the latest installment of the family-friendly horror games loved by millions of players from all over the globe. Play as Gregory, a young boy trapped overnight in Freddy Fazbear’s Mega Pizzaplex. With the help of Freddy Fazbear himself, Gregory must survive the near-unstoppable hunt of reimagined Five Nights at Freddy’s characters - as well as new, horrific threats.

Enter the ruins of Freddy Fazbear’s Mega Pizzaplex in the all-new, FREE story DLC for Five Nights at Freddy’s: Security Breach, now included with Purchase of the Base Game on Epic Games Store. Gregory is once again trapped in the now abandoned Pizzaplex, and he needs your help! Can you save your friend, yourself, and the Pizzaplex?

name: After Doom
description: "After Doom" takes place between Doom II: Hell on Earth and Doom 64,

name: Rivals of Aether: Speedrunner Mario
description: A mod which adds Speedrunner Mario from the Something About series by TerminalMontage to Rivals of Aether.

name: Rivals of Aether: 100% Accurate Fox
description: A mod which adds 100% Accurate Fox (aka Melee Fox) from the Something About series by TerminalMontage to Rivals of Aether.

name: Biocatalyst
description: Biocatalyst is a short horror visual novel set in the late 1990s with a PC-98 aesthetic.

name: Prey at the Altar
description:
You are the chosen lamb of the Church of the Hound, a sacrifice to summon an ancient god to cleanse this earth of its sins. It's an honor!

You want this. You want this very badly. Everyone wants this for you. The Church, its people, its god. So the choice is obvious.

You are the lamb. Prepare yourself for slaughter.

name: The Primrose Path
description: A piece of Interactive Fiction written by Nolan Bonvouloir.

name: Pokkén Tournament: Update Ver.A14
description: Version A14 is an update for the arcade version of Pokkén Tournament released on July 20th, 2016. It added four new characters and made balance changes to bring the game in line with the Wii U version as of Version 1.3, as well as including Reshiram and Cresselia as support Pokémon, adding Mission Panel mode, and expanding the Tutorial mode.

name: Pokkén Tournament: Update Ver.N01
description: Version N01 was an update released for the arcade version of Pokkén Tournament on February 9th, 2016. Most notably, it made Chandelure available as a Battle Pokémon.

name: Pine: A Story of Loss
description: Alone in the forest glade he shared with his wife, a woodworker struggles to accept her passing. Help him hold on to cherished memories of their life together as he struggles to care for himself and his now empty home. Pine is a single-serving game focused on telling a beautiful, emotional tale.

name: Pokkén Tournament: Update Ver.C07
description: Version C07 is an update to the arcade version of Pokkén Tournament released on September 13th, 2016. It added the support sets of Victini and Dragonite and new Halloween-themed costumes, as well as Training Gym and Tellur Town (Autumn) as stages.

name: Nintendo MP3 Player
description:
Also known as Play-Yan Micro, it was a special cartridge which added media player capabilities to the Game Boy Micro. It is an updated version of the original Play-Yan, which had been marketed for the Game Boy Advance SP.

This iteration is not compatible with the microgames which were released for the original version.

name: Grande Fratello: Il Gioco
description: Sin descripción

name: Chibi 3D Online RPG Sandbox
description:
Welcome to the Chibi World Simulation! Build your own CHIBI World and meet and make Chibi friends all over the world.

Pick up your favorite Chibi Uniform and Cosplay as a Schoolgirl Chibi girl or school boy. You can either choose to play Adventure Mode where you can kill Monsters or you can play Role-Playing Mode where you can role play with your friends or alone. You can choose from a huge amount of user created Maps like High School Maps, Yandere Maps, Shopping Malls, Cafes, Bars, Parkour Maps and literally anything that you can imagine.

name: MOE Emo Girls Multiplayer
description:
She is a dark emo girl that loves big guns - are you able to handle her?

Lots of customization opportunities such as Dark Goth Emo Loli Styles, Vintage fashion, Ordinary or Casula Looks up to Weird Girl Aesthetic and even more crazy stuff.

name: Cyber Citizen Shockman 3: The Princess From Another World
description: Sonya and Arnold battle a new mysterious enemy in Shockman 3!

name: Fantasy Mosaics 5
description: Sin descripción

name: Sanae's Sylphid Breeze
description:
This is a remake of the old version.

Sanae has Kirby's signature method of dispatching enemies by using the ability of inhaling with extreme power. By pressing X button repeatedly, Sanae is able to fly for as long as she likes to reach higher platforms or to find secret item locations.

name: Flowers of Asphodel
description: Sin descripción

name: Marvel First Alliance
description:
A fan-game made by a brazilian developer named "Zvitor" that launches Marvel First Alliance as an indie game created with the popular OpenBor engine. The game is a beat’em up inspired by the likes of Streets of Rage and Double Dragon and features a dream team that will certainly please any Marvel fan. But best of all, it features simultaneous four-player action in one computer!

All in all, Marvel First Alliance is one of the finest examples of the freeware fighting genre, offering dozens of characters that many players are sure to appreciate. "

name: Love, Hate and the Mysterious Ocean Tower
description: A dashing and magnetic genius has invited his closest companion to an eldritch structure, hoping to avert a cataclysm and hiding a terrible secret.

name: Bolix
description: Bolix is a Pipe Mania type of game where you have to place tile-based pipes in order to lead the ball to one end of the board to the other, scoring points for each tile passed.

name: The Little Girl Mill of a Ginko
description: Sin descripción

name: Little Lookouts
description: Sin descripción

name: Professor Layton Royale
description: This game is a cross-over between the Professor Layton and the Kaito Royale series in which players take the role of a detective, a criminal or a normal citizen. Detectives and citizens need to work together to find out who are the criminals.

name: Winch it Out
description: Tired of the same old Two-Button Gas-and-Go car games? This one's for you!

name: Gothic Classic Khorinis Saga
description: A collection of Gothic Classic and Gothic II Complete Classic for Nintendo Switch.

name: Tiny Garden
description:
Tiny Garden, build your own magical garden inside a 90s toy
Plant your vegetables and trade them for furniture to customize tiny gardens in this delightful mix of farming, puzzle and strategy

name: Loneliest Depths
description:
What mysteries await beneath the oceans surface?

Step inside your diving bell and venture into the deepest depths of the Bitter Maw Trench, encountering a vast array of dazzling ocean life and documenting your discoveries!

Press the central switch to engage the diving bell’s viewing lantern, providing high voltage florescent light to even the lowest depths of the ocean floor.

name: The Legend of Spyro: A New Beginning
description: Sin descripción

name: The Legend of Spyro: The Eternal Night
description: Sin descripción

name: Go! George Go!
description: Sin descripción

name: Globeba
description: Your magic tome has been stolen by the weather wizard Ogro! Use your summoning magic to plant helpful tubers and mandrakes to make your way through three handcrafted dungeons. Overcome foe after foe to retrieve what is rightfully yours and reunite with your floral friends!

name: Little Planet
description:
Little Planet (LP) is a 3D life-simulation, and role-playing game for VR headsets that will let you escape into a fairytale, charming, ever-growing world full of fun, items, creatures, and wonder or play whenever and wherever you want with yourself or friends.

Live your dream new life, develop relationships with adorable characters, craft or trade versatile, beautiful items which you can use in-game and explore with old /new friends, or find a spot to enjoy yourself for sunset!

name: Office Cat
description: Embark on a unique entrepreneurial journey in a world ruled by cats! You are the boss of a burgeoning business empire, where adorable kitties lead the charge. Prepare to build, expand, and manage your way to riches.

name: Devil Zone
description: A spaceship fights against wave after wave of alien demons.

name: Monuments of Mars 2
description: Monuments of Mars 2 is an eleven-level episode WAD for Doom II designed for limit removing source ports created by various members of the Doomer Boards community, led by Jon Vail (40oz). It is the forty-sixth entry in the ongoing Doomer Boards Projects. The project is an add-on sequel to the first DBP in celebration of the series' fourth anniversary. It is intended to be loaded with and continue from its predecessor and starts at MAP08.

name: Look Closer!
description: Look Closer! is a single-player horror surveillance game. Monitor haunted locations through cameras, spotting and reporting anomalies like moving objects and sudden intruders. Sharp observation skills are essential to survive the eerie challenges.

name: Kirakira Slimes
description: Kirakira slimes are adorable, chubby and defenseless creatures. They're vulnerable to most of the world's perils by themselves, but together they’re unbeatable. Fuse, combine and power up your slimes in this indie puzzle game, either by playing in local versus or all by yourself!

name: Rune: Gold
description: Sin descripción

name: Awful Kidnapper
description:
In Awful Kidnapper, you play as a horror fan, living deep in the woods. One day you decide to kidnap someone to make your dark desires come true.

But, guess what - It's not that easy to keep someone hostage!

Your victims are weirder than you'd think!

name: Infinite Chef
description: Infinite Chef is a cooking simulation game that can be played directly in a web browser. It features a unique dish name generator and hundreds of ingredients to cook and play with.

name: Roped In
description: Sin descripción

name: It Lives Within
description: You're finally ready to leave your past behind and move on. But apparently, moving on means enrolling at a community college in a supernatural town overflowing with monsters and dark magic...

name: Bowling
description: Sin descripción

name: JumpStart Math for Kindergarteners
description: JumpStart Math for Kindergartners is a game released in 1999 that teaches kindergarten math skills. Hopsalot helps the residents of CloudTown prepare a surprise birthday party for the giant Guthry.

name: Beena Town he Youkoso
description: Copies were shipped with earlier models of the Advanced Pico Beena system, and is not thought to have been sold separately.

name: Toxicity
description: Shades first ever released Quake 2 singleplayer level - only 25 years later!

name: Combat Jam 1
description: Mappers were given 48 hours to make a combat focused level. No fancy textures. No lighting. No detailing. Just pure gameplay. It features multiple unique combat scenarios, a hub map and a boss fight.

name: Alea Lacta Est
description: A hybrid of ideas and gameplay mixed together in a brand-new campaign for Quake 2. Be warned though, it's a little biased towards the old school way of playing.

name: Space Station Proto Speedmap Jam
description: 1st Prototype Speedmapping Map Jam for the Quake 2 Remaster, focusing on an open ended "space station" theme, hosted by the Map-Center Discord server.

name: N64 SP Map Jam
description: The first ever Single Player Map Jam for the Quake 2 Re-Release, hosted by the Map-Center community. Featuring nine new maps in the N64 theme, a hub level, and a final boss, as well as custom pre-rendered cutscenes.

name: Sore Ike! Anpanman: Hajimete Kaketa yo! Oboeta yo! Hiragana, Katakana: 50-on Board Kinou-tsuki

name: Oshare Majo Love and Berry: Cute ni Oshare
description:
Oshare Majo: Love and Berry CUTE Ni Oshare is a game for the Advanced Pico Beena in Japan only. This game focuses on fashion, puzzles, and rhythm minigames compared to the other Love and Berry series Advanced Pico Beena release Chiiku Drill Oshare Majo Love and Berry: Moji Kazu Chie Asobi, which focuses more on solving equations.

Despite the game featuring the songs in MIDI format, it also features the vocal version of ABCD Everything's Okay!

name: Oshare Beena: o-Mise de Kisekae Make Haircut
description: Sin descripción

name: Capslock
description:
Capslock is a casual game focused on design and testing your imagination. Choose between 100 skins, 195+ custom keys, 220+ symbols and more (so far) to test your designs and make unique keyboards. Relax as you listen to the 'clicky' sounds, chosen to help you unwind and immerse into a keyboard building environment.

Start from scratch - solve the puzzle of dragging and dropping each key into its' slot to build out your keyboard, or dive straight into designing and auto-fill all your keys with the press of a button! You can edit one key at a time, or make changes to your whole board - we hope Capslock moves at a pace which suits you.

name: Samsara Room
description: Samsara Room is the first game created by Studio Maarten, which would later become known as Rusty Lake. It is the precursor for the Cube Escape series, and contains similar puzzles that have been carried into the Rusty Lake games.

name: Countryballs At War
description: Immerse yourself in Countryballs at War, an extraordinary strategy game combining the strategic depth of turn-based mechanics with thrilling real-time combat. Published by SHN Games, you will take command of your armies, carefully manage tax rates, negotiate peace treaties, and even puppet weakened countries to establish your dominance on the global stage.

name: Pokémon Mega Evolution Aquamarine
description:
What would you do if your entire childhood, your home, your world… collapsed before your eyes on a day like any other?

In this hack, we will live the story of a young man whose past was tragic.
Our protagonist will have to face a tyrannical and corrupt organization, whose radical desires for peace lead to the massacre of innocents or the destruction of entire towns due to mere suspicions.

The government receives enormous financial income from this organization, the police do not intervene or act in this situation…
The citizens live in fear, the coaches do not dare to stand up to this injustice…

Our Hero is not a rookie, He has enormous knowledge about POKéMON and is very different from other young people his age.
We will see his ability in combat shine more than once, but not only his… The protagonist will meet brave heroes who will join his cause.

name: My Talking Girl
description: My Talking Pretty Girl repeated every word you say. When girls are unhappy, play with girls. When the girl is hungry, give the girl feeding. When the girl is sleepy, let the girl sleep.

name: My Talking Pretty Girl
description: My Talking Pretty Girl repeated every word you say, let her become your close friends! Enjoy the girl to bring you the laughter and happiness! Play addictively cute mini-games and collect coins to get cool items for my talking pretty girl. You can dress up your girl, change clothes for her and change her room.

name: Ürs
description: A gamestorybook by Christopher Hayes and Daniel Talsky.

name: Skybreak!
description: A science-fantasy role-playing game written by William Dooling.

name: Tubedle
description: A webgame that lets you see how well you know your favorite youtubers

name: Viva Hexagon! Feat. Ipulo
description: Viva Hexagon! is a tile-matching versus puzzle game, where you have to match hexagonal cells by controlling a small playable platforming character on the board to pick up and move pieces. Featured game modes include versus mode, which can be played against a friend or an A.I. opponent, solo mode, which can be played by yourself, and battle mode, which can be played against a friend or an A.I. opponent. There is also a custom game option, which gives you a myriad of options to customize for all 3 game modes, as well as alternate rules such as changing what happens to the opponent when you score matches.

name: Battle Guys
description:
Welcome to Battle Guys: Royale - the ultimate shooter showdown in the mobile warfare of 2024!

Gear up for an adrenaline-pumping multiplayer battle royale experience where every moment counts. Engage in fast-paced PvP action, dominate the battlegrounds, and become the star of the brawl!

name: A Tale of Paper: Unfolded Melody
description:
In A Tale Of Paper: Unfolded Melody you will discover the beautiful and sad tale of Ada, a brand-new origami character with its own story to tell. Learn new abilities and explore unseen locations while you try to uncover the mysteries behind this magical tale.

The last chapter of A Tale of Paper awaits. Unfold its secrets and become the ultimate origami master.

name: Walt Disney World Quest: Magical Racing Tour
description: Sin descripción

name: Depths of Despair
description: Welcome to Depths of Despair, a thrilling solo/multiplayer game where you must fight off waves of enemies to survive for a set amount of time. With each wave, the enemies become stronger and more challenging to defeat. Can you and your team hold out long enough?

name: ShiroKuro: Shiroi Kokoro to Kuroi Tsurugi
description: A visual novel from developers ALTERNA. Akira leaves his town to observe the first and last major meteor shower in this century and gets in an accident. He regains consciousness when he is attacked by some black life form "Zyphos". A girl appears and rescues him. This way Akira makes the first contact with the extraterrestrial life forms and gets involved in the species confrontation.

name: Final Doomer
description:
Final Doomer (also known as Final Doomer+ after the update) is a gameplay mod featuring 9 weapon classes themed after official and community-made megawads. Barring the Doom 2-themed class, each set replaces the entire arsenal with new weapons that have altered functionality and stronger damage rates while still fitting into a vanilla template.

TNTguy's chaingun replacement is a pair of machine pistols that fire weaker bullets but at a splintering rate. The Ancient Aliens weaponset swaps the rocket launcher for the Photon Scepter, which fires a ball of light that explodes wider the farther it travels. The mod's simplicity combined with its creativity make it a very easy mod to use with mostly any wad.

name: Decision 2: New City
description:
Decision 2: New City is the second game in the Decision series, implementing new features like new weapons, abilities and gameplay elements.
Another city is infested with zombies and other creatures and you're the last survivor. Keep your eyes open, aim and remember you're alone.

name: Os Invasores do Futuro 2

name: Portal Defenders
description: This is a kind of spiritual sequel to our mini-games Castle Crashing the Beard and Pico Blast, but taken to a new level of completeness. It's also our tribute to the site that keeps us inspired and all the people in it (35 unique NG personalities represented in this).

name: Casino Simulator 2024
description: Casino Simulator: Build, manage, and expand your own casino from scratch. Hire staff, design your casino, and delight customers by offering the most popular games. Enjoy the thrill of the casino experience!

name: FoxCode
description: FoxCode is a casual, accessible shooter perfect for unwinding. With intuitive gameplay, it welcomes all skill levels to dynamic battles. Stands out for diverse maps, from urban to natural, ideal for light, thrilling entertainment.

name: Insectonator
description:
Insectonator is a 2D casual Shooter created using Flash and made by BGamesSite. The basic premise is that a backyard is filled with bugs (well, mostly) of various kinds, and the job is to exterminate them... at all costs. There’s only one person who can handle this high-caliber job - you.

Unlock and choose from an assortment of up to 26 different weapons (from the humble beginnings of a rock to the bazooka to the nuke) to exterminate 20 types of insects. Earn up to 28 achievements from accomplishing various tasks such as using certain classes of weaponry to kill the bugs, kill enough, miss enough, etc. Build up your arsenal of weaponry by completing these various achievements.

name: Insectonator: Zombie Mode
description:
The Insectonator series continues with Insectonator: Zombie Mode, where instead of killing bugs, you kill zombies that are only the size of bugs. There is a new mode called 'Don't Touch My Gem,' where you defend your gem from being taken by zombies within the time limit, along with a new variety of weapons such as the sword and basketball, along with many other old weapons.

All in all, shoot and blast your way to victory!

name: Sonic Rumble
description: On your mark, get set...PLAY! Get ready to race in the Sonic Rumble! Jump into a speedy, 32-person mobile royale set in a cheery toy world created by Dr. Eggman. Play as some of your favorite characters from the Sonic the Hedgehog universe complete with customization to create your perfect avatar as you dive into action-packed gameplay.

description: Part of the LINE QUICK GAME service. Vertical scrolling shoot 'em up game featuring characters from "The Battle Cats". Developed by PONOS and Game Closure.

description: QuakeWorld is an official source port of Quake that enhances the game's multiplayer features with improved TCP/IP support and addition of client-side prediction.

name: Nyanko New Japan
description: Released to celebrate the 8th anniversary of The Battle Cats. Puzzle game where you stack Japanese prefectures on top of each other to create a New Japan.

You were engaged for combat missions in a research operation on the island full of huge flying creatures.
Enter a free-fire zone where anything that moves is a legit target. Invading insects descending from the skies? Blast them to bits! Upgrade your weapon set to stay one step ahead of your six-legged enemeies!

name: SkateLab
description: A 100% physics-driven skateboarding sandbox. Experiment in a world with unconstrained physics, create spots, record clips, and skate online with your friends.

name: Apex Legends: Upheaval
description:
When Alter emerged from her dimension into another (with her past held close to the chest), she had only two things: her interdimensional traveling Void tech, and a desire to have fun. She stole the fanciest of foods, learned to fight through dicey situations, and took on odd jobs for personal favors–though she didn’t have a problem double-crossing her clients if it was more beneficial or amusing. Never needing to stick around for the consequences of her actions eroded any sense of morality or responsibility she had. She could focus on what was important: making sure life was never mundane.

Alter was drawn to worlds on the edge of complete destruction. Whether something devastating was already happening or she helped usher in the apocalypse herself, she was there to watch whatever catastrophe ensued. It was only in those moments, after all, that people took off the masks they always wore and she could see their true selves.

Finding these world-ending events was a toss up. Sometimes she’d find what she was looking for, and on others, she’d have missed the main event in worlds already ruined. But in some of these ruined worlds, Alter began to notice an interesting commonality…

Many of these worlds hadn’t met their end by some random event; they had been destroyed by the same person.

[Redacted]

The game features speech-to-text technology, letting you talk directly to characters with your own voice. description: In the action-adventure platformer, Akimbot, blast your way through armies of robots, pilot spaceships and forge your own path to save the universe from impending doom! Set in a sci-fi world where only robots exist, travel the galaxy and experience non-stop robot mayhem and explosive action!

name: Nerobi
description:
This indie game is a 2D scrolling platformer with several elements typical of a graphic adventure, featuring some cinematic sequences. It is all hand-drawn.
The gameplay is definitely challenging. It requires coordination and timing, and you have to use your wits. Different powers are unlocked as you go along, expanding the gameplay experience.
In addition, scattered around the world, there are several hidden cards to collect.

name: Clothing Store Simulator
description: Are you ready to shape fashion world? Make a brand deal, order products, fill the aisles, dress the mannequins and start selling. Dresses, shirts, coats, pants, nightwear, underwear, shoes and more are waiting for you.

name: Chess But All At Once
description:
Move ALL your pieces each turn!

What if you could move all your pieces in one turn in Chess? Only one way to find out!

Friendly for amateurs and professionals alike - come experience chess like never before. If you master it you'll never blunder again!

Enjoy Daily challenges that'll push the limits of your understanding of Chess... but all at once.

name: Total War: Warhammer II - Rakarth
description:
Since taming the infamous black dragon Bracchus as a youth, Rakarth has long held a reputation as the most cruelly talented of Naggaroth’s Beastmasters. It is a claim none dispute, as he soars high over the battlefield on the mighty beast before diving into the fray in a murderous blur of talons and teeth.

Voiced by actor Iwan Rheon, Rakarth begins play on the Isle of Albion and leads the Thousand Maws faction. As he claims victory in battle and captures key settlements, new monsters of all kinds are added to his Beast Pens where they may be recruited into his armies.

name: Ninkyo Dantai
description: Ninkyo Dantai is a 3D top-down, role-playing video game developed by TeamCS1. It is the first mainline title in the Ninkyo Dantai franchise developed as a turn-based RPG.

name: Control Monger

name: Talon
description: Talon is a 6DoF multiplayer sci-fi flight combat game blending elements from FPS, flight sim, and space combat for adrenaline-fueled high-speed action in a team-based tactical shooter with colorful weapons and plentiful explosions. It became freeware on November 24th of 2023.

description: The digital "Sexy Soaker" edition includes the same DLC pack as the physical LE containing the Soaking Wet High School Uniform costume, a set of colorful bikini costumes, the Futomaki Roll Bazooka special weapon, a Bebeby pet card, and a special set of skill cards, and a downloadable soundtrack containing the same 47 music tracks included in the soundtrack CD of the physical version.

Can you mend the ventilation system and escape, or will the crawlspace become your eternal tomb?

The monkey is blasted out a cannon at a direction based on the players choosing. The game was developed by American studio Yobonja and was released for iOS in January 2011 and Android in February 2011.

and sell them to earn money, meow!
Buy fresh ingredients at the best prices, turn them into dishes, and sell them to customers to earn money, meow!

name: Corgi's Travel
description:
A scientist is conducting experiments with a machine that can shrink objects. To ensure safety, he decides to do the experiments a bit away from his house, but he makes the mistake of bringing his dog along.

Without the scientist noticing, the dog accidentally presses the machine's button, getting shrunk and gaining superpowers. Thus begins the dog's journey back home, trying to find a way to reverse the effect and return to normal size, while facing various challenges, including giant insects.

This brand new addicting word game starts simple but ramps up fast! Exercise your brain with over 3,000 challenging word puzzles. Tap into your word smarts to unlock new levels with ever-more challenging puzzles and build your word game skill! How far will you go?

This modern word search game is a joy to play! You will be amazed at how many words you can find in 5, 6, and 7 letters.

Become The No. 1 Summoner Support in Hell!

Take calls from disgruntled demons as you try and fix their summoning rituals! Use the book generously provided to you by our partners at SCRYN to assist demons put together their summoning rituals.

Try to beat your friends, or to earn your keep to stay another week in hell.*

*NOTE: You are not paid for your time as a Summoning Support Employee
