name: Dynamite Joe
description: Dynamite Joe is a game where you avoid cops and monsters as you dash to escape prison by collecting keys to get on the next level.

name: Garten of Banban 8
description: Explore the most obscure levels of Banban’s Kindergarten. Survive the new deceives and mysteries that await you. Uncover the truth behind the place, and find the whereabouts of your missing child…

name: Graveyard Shift at Freddy's
description:
"Graveyard Shift at Freddy's" is a small Re-Imagining of the original Five Nights at Freddy's, with new twists and turns! Featuring brand new mechanics, visuals, characters, and an entirely new story for you to unravel.

Venture into "Freddybear's Eatery and Fun", watch feeds, and ensure nothing gets damaged.

name: Shootrush
description: A runner where you have to avoid obstacles while defending yourself from robots who want to kill you.

name: Escape Academy: Tournament of Puzzles
description:
Hit the road with Coach Yoach and experience all new arenas, game modes, power-ups, and PUZZLES! Solve your way through giant, replayable arenas filled with secret passages, alternate routes and randomized puzzles.

Journey to Egypt’s Tomb of the First Escapist, the rain soaked and tech-infused Hackannery, or everyone’s favorite Escape theater The Showman’s Studio!

Face off against fellow Escapists in three new competitive modes Escape Race, Tic-Tac-Toe, and Scavenger Hunt, featuring all different mechanics!

And if you thought things couldn’t get wackier, Tournament of Puzzles features exciting new Power-Ups! Deploy distracting traps against your opponents or or gain an advantage by utilizing assists and secure the win.

More of a solo solver? Not a problem! Coach Yoach is happy to let any Escapist puzzle their way through the arenas in single player mode. See how fast you can conquer each course and compete for your best time!

name: Clockwork Knight Puzzle
description:
Clockwork Knight: Pengin War is an unreleased Sega Saturn game based on the Clockwork Knight series. It was canceled for unknown reasons, but a prototype surfaced in 2006, dated 20th June, 1995 with a product code labelled GS-9015.

The subtitle is not official (the game refers to itself simply as "Clockwork Knight"), but has been applied due to the existence of the words "Pengin War" in the prototype version's header. Gameplay is similar to Sega's Pengo, which may suggest "Pengin" is a misspelling of "Penguin". That, or it originally had nothing to do with Clockwork Knight. Issue #3 of Sega Saturn Magazine calls the game Clockwork Knight Puzzle and suggests a February/March 1996 release date for Japan.

The game is played from a top-down perspective, in which Pepperouchau can pick up blocks from underneath him to reveal eggs. The object of the game is to defeat all the enemies by kicking eggs at them.

name: The A-Team
description: In this game, players control a soldier who must shoot four massive heads that belong to those of the four characters from the series. Each head shoots back, and contact with their bullets result in a loss of life. Once the heads are destroyed, the players proceed to the next level. As players progress to new levels, the speed of each head increases, making it difficult for players to avoid bullets.

name: Georg Glaxo
description: Georg Glaxo is a promotional game released by the Danish subsidiary of pharmaceutical company Glaxo. It's a side scrolling platform shooter where the player takes control of Georg, a boy who has asthma. The game consists of four levels, each representing one of the seasons of the year. In each level the young boy will come across various animals that he can dodge or shoot at. Some of these, like sharks, are direct dangers while others just affects Georg's asthma. If it gets too bad he will get sick, start to cough and move slower. However this can be prevented by taking the right medicine. There are three different kinds of medicine, Flixotide (orange), Serevent (green) and Ventoline (blue). The orange and green should be taken every morning and evening, while the blue one is taken when Georg gets sick. A green, yellow and orange meter shows the current condition. If the marker is within the green area everything is okay.

name: The Great Space Race
description:
The Great Space Race is a combination role-playing game and science-fiction space combat game. The basic premise of the game is that a new super-drink called Natof has been discovered. Natof has three key properties, which are to get the person drunk, never leave him with a hangover, and supply him with all the nutrition required from a well-balanced (if never sober) diet.

The name Natof is a portmanteau of the phrase "NAme TO Follow" - the sentence sent with the first batch of miracle drink by the discoverer.

The manual describes the game as "a true computer movie. The player can just watch events unfold, joining in as much or as little as he wishes." The objective is "to deliver, to the space stations as much Natof as the player can, as fast as he can." The game will play itself if left alone — indeed the computer generally makes a better player than a human does — although that rather defeats the point of the game.

name: Mutations
description: Originally part of a compilation, Mutations is a clone of Spawn of Evil, where the player, as a patrol unit, must seek and destroy the enemy mutants, cloners, asteroids and battlecars.

name: One for the Road
description: Originally part of a compilation, One for the Road is a clone of Pac-Man, where the player drives a car around the maze picking up the Cat's Eye's, avoiding the hostile road signs. The road signs become temporarily harmless after collecting an oil can.

name: One for the Road / Mutations
description:
A compilation of the two following games:

One for the Road - a clone of Pac-Man, where the player drives a car around the maze picking up the Cat's Eye's, avoiding the hostile road signs. The road signs become temporarily harmless after collecting an oil can.

Mutations - a clone of Spawn of Evil, where the player, as a patrol unit, must seek and destroy the enemy mutants, cloners, asteroids and battlecars.

name: Super Gran
description:
Super Gran is a game using the character from the 80s TV Show of the same name. You play as Super Gran and you must play eight levels with four different styles of games, as you attempt to thwart Scunner Campbell and his goons Tub and Rent-a-muscle.

The first level sees you in a flying machine viewed from the side with the whole level shown on the screen. You must avoid and bomb the other flying machines and you complete the level when the timer reaches zero. The second level sees you with the ability to fly as yourself but with limited fuel which is viewed from the side but the game scrolls left or right when you move. You must avoid balloons and planes while you can collect any car or cat on the ground. There are fuel depots which will increase your fuel meter.

The third level has you driving on a vertical scrolling road viewed from above as you must avoid the other car on the road and touching the sides. You can speed up or slow down. The fourth level is a platform game with the whole level shown on the screen. You must get to the top by jumping from various platforms while avoiding the bombs from a helicopter. Hitting a platform at the wrong angle also kills you and the tide slowly rises at the bottom.

Once you have completed the four levels you then repeat them again. You have five lives and once they have gone it is game over. The joystick is used to control your hero with just one player playing the game.

The C16 version has just three levels and misses out the second level where Super Gran flies.

name: World Championship Soccer
description: This is the ZX Spectrum port of the SEGA Mega Drive game of the same name.

name: Barn 51
description:
Fed up of filing complaints from local ranchers whose cattle was abducted by aliens, the CIA launched project Barn 51. It consisted in a team of bionically enhanced farm animals specifically trained to hunt down aliens.

Take control of Combat Cow, Scuba Sheep, Hoverin Hog and Rocket Rooster in this fast paced Alex Kidd in Miracle World hack.

name: Crazy Pinball
description:
The Pinball fever of the 80's in your console!!!

A new arcade machine store has opened in your neighborhood.

The best pinball players are crowding in front of the machines trying to get the best score possible!

Play any of the three new machines in the scene, from the simple but addictive "Wild Saloon" and "Sport Bets" to the biggest challenge known in pinball machines, "Pink world", not for the faint of heart!

Share your records and compete against other players, your scores are saved for the posterity.

Were you penalized in your youth for playing too hard? In Crazy Pinball the machines do not punish strong hits. No fear!

And when you have achieved a record in the three pinball machines, try a hidden arcade classic, too good to be missed!

name: EA Sports College Football 25: Deluxe Edition
description: In EA SPORTS College Football 25 experience explosive gameplay variety across 134 FBS schools and immerse yourself in the iconic atmospheres of college football as you chase college greatness.

name: Formula 1
description: This simple Amstrad CPC game was published as a listing in the January 1988 issue of the Greek magazine Pixel.

name: Chocolate
description:
Nobody is aware of the dangers lurking in Antarctica.
Try to be - one of the few - to find the shelters and make it back alive.
Feel the horror of being lost.

name: Formula 1
description: Pass the oncoming cars in this BASIC version of Grand Prix Driver. Originally released as a type-in listing in The Amstrad Game Book by Pitman Publishing.

name: Classic Marathon
description:
From the team that brought you Aleph One, the classic sci-fi FPS Marathon from Bungie on Mac revived for modern hardware by the fan community.

Alien forces have boarded the colony ship UESC Marathon in the Tau Ceti system, in orbit around humanity’s first interstellar colony. The situation is dire, and as a security officer assigned to the Marathon, your duty is to defend the ship and its crew from the alien threat.

This classic 1994 Bungie FPS had a foundational influence on the genre, and is now maintained by the fan community. Experience authentic game play using the original data files, with achievements, optional widescreen HUD support, 3D filtering/perspective, positional audio, and 60+ fps interpolation, just in case the original is too authentic.

name: Our Souls Never Sleep
description: Player will face choices that determine their fate and the fates of the friends they make along the way in this psychological horror game.

name: Forgotten Playland
description:
Forgotten Playland is a free-to-play, social party game that takes place in the quiet solitude of a long-forgotten and abandoned house, where a whimsical world unfolds.

Within the dusty rooms and forgotten corners of time, an enchanting realm comes to life as the once-discarded toys left by their owners embark on a magical journey of their own.

Welcome to Forgotten Playland, a realm where the PlushKyns breathe life into a world of games and adventures.

name: Magnavox Odyssey DS
description:
Magnavox Odyssey DS is a port of the first ever home video game system released in 1972, Odyssey. It includes different chips which each chip contains a minigame.

The following games are available:

Chip 1 - No overlay.
Chip 2 - Simon Says, Skiing.
Chip 3 - Football, Hockey, Tennis, Analogic.
Chip 4 - Haunted House.

name: Classic Marathon 2
description:
From the team that brought you Aleph One, the classic sci-fi FPS Marathon 2: Durandal from Bungie on Mac revived for modern hardware by the fan community.

Fresh from your triumph on the colony ship Marathon, you are seized by the rogue AI Durandal to do his bidding in a distant part of the galaxy. Within the ruins of an ancient civilization, you must seek the remnants of a lost clan and uncover their long-buried secrets. Battle opponents ancient and terrible, with sophisticated weapons and devious strategies, all the while struggling to escape the alien nightmare…

This classic 1995 Bungie FPS is now maintained by the fan community. Experience authentic game play using the original data files, with achievements, optional widescreen HUD support, 3D filtering/perspective, positional audio, and 60+ fps interpolation, just in case the original is too authentic.

name: Classic Marathon Infinity
description:
From the team that brought you Aleph One, the classic sci-fi FPS Marathon Infinity from Bungie on Mac revived for modern hardware by the fan community.

Marathon Infinity takes the closed universe of the Marathon series and blows it wide open. The solo/co-op campaign, “Blood Tides of Lh’owon,” is a 20-level scenario sporting new textures, weapons, and enemies. More than that, the scenario sheds a surprising new light on the story’s characters and the meaning of events. Having defeated the Pfhor and reawakened the ancient remnants of the S’pht, the player now faces a world where friends become enemies and all is not what it seems…

This classic 1996 Bungie FPS is now maintained by the fan community. Experience authentic game play using the original data files, with achievements, optional widescreen HUD support, 3D filtering/perspective, positional audio, and 60+ fps interpolation, just in case the original is too authentic.

name: PainKeep Arena
description: PainKeep Arena is a "Mission-Pack" designed for use with the registered version of Quake III Arena. PainKeep Arena not only offers brand new weapons, but also rich environments packed with tons of new sounds, new special effects, great new features, and lots of surprises.

name: Rocket Arena 3
description: All the goodness of Rocket Arena 2 and much much more. Rocket Arena 3 will redefine what a mod can and should be, going beyond simple gameplay and map additions and adding to the core engine itself. Thanks to the power of client side code in Quake 3, a huge number of features never before thought possible will now take Rocket Arena 3 to that next level. Welcome to the next generation of Rocket Arena, and the next evolution of Quake.

name: Kuray Infinite Fusion
description: Kuray Infinite Fusion (KIF) is a fork of the Pokemon Infinite Fusion fangame which adds countless new features including infinite colors for shinies, mod support, improved AI, multiple QoL changes and more.

name: PainKeep
description: PainKeep is a DeathMatch-only “mission-pack” designed for use with registered Quake. PainKeep not only offers brand new weapons (with new pickup and view models), but also a new rich environment with tons of new sounds, new special effects, great new features, and lots of surprises.

name: Odesa Combined
description: Sin descripción

name: Rocket Arena 2
description: Rocket Arena 2 is one of the most popular Quake 2 mods of all time. It's innovative "multi-arena" maps allows players to choose from up to 10 arenas on a single level, and have matches going on in all of them simulatnously. The refined "pickup" mode introduces players to the fast-paced teamplay style of Clan Arena.

name: Clothing Store Simulator
description: Welcome to "Clothing Store Simulator: Your Fashion Haven"! Manage inventory, set prices, hire staff, and expand your store with a vast array of clothing themes. From casual chic to formal elegance, Online orders, security, and local market .

name: Endless Crimes of the Future
description:
Do not fear falling, you have cybernetic limbs. Use the scrolling coloured button on your ship to direct its course. Find the scrolling coloured buttons on the ground and use them to call your ship to pick you up.

Humanity has been enslaved by unknown forces. You are a time traveller and a rebel outsider living high above the city. What can you even do in the face of such a situation?

name: Abstract Ritual
description:
You are searching for the entrance to the secret world.
You are just a natural explorer I guess. It's cool.

Please excuse the spirit monsters being a bit mean, they are just stressed out.

name: The Pyramid Gate
description: The Pyramid Gate is a short but very atmospheric little adventure created by developer Strangethink for the "lowrezjam". Players will explore a very obtuse and surreal environment to see if they can unravel the mysteries of the various pyramids around.

name: Maria-sama ga Gyakuten: Etape de l'hiver
description: This sequel contains a double parody, featuring a courtroom showdown that is being released here in digital format for the first time.

name: Cubed and Dangerous
description: Cubed and Dangerous is a charming stylized twin-stick shooter that seamlessly merges action roguelike mechanics and action RPG mechanics into an exciting run-based experience.

name: Floaty McFloatFace: Just Keep Floating
description: Sin descripción

name: Jing Hua Yuan
description: Being incredibly power-hungry, the Empress Wu one winter morning orders all the flowers in the kingdom to bloom. Thus sets off a string of consequences which are faced by a small group of travelers as they journey through many strange lands, including such places as the Country of Women and the Country of Two-Faced People.

name: Valkyrie: The Magical Odyssey
description: A fantasy sidescroller for DOS based in norse mythology.

name: Protectron 23 vs. the Alien Armada
description: Fight your way through waves of alien drones, to make it to the ALIEN BOSS and destroy it!

name: Bighead
description: Everything seems fine on a Saturday night, you're about to watch a horror movie with your partner, when suddenly something happens. Dive into this nightmarish story about big heads

name: Gensou Sekai: Eastland Saga
description:
Reimu travels alone at first, but new heroines can be obtained as the player progresses through the game's story by exploring the game world and defeating opponents.
The battle system is turn-based with the protagonists and antagonists on different sides of the battlefield, using various commands such as: attack, magic, heal, defend and run.

name: Disney Infinity
description: The Wii version has a number of differences due to it’s weaker hardware.

name: Castlevania Chronicles III: Dracula's Curse
description:
A fanmade remake of Castlevania III: Dracula's Curse by studio WarMachine.

Experience Castlevania III like never before!
Enhanced visuals, mechanics, and new abilities such as item crashes, updated spells and forms, fully remastered OST, and much more!!!

"Do you have what it takes to face me?!"

It's always better to play with friends, and this time you get to keep ALL your partners along the way!

name: Zeta Wolf: First Bite
description: Explore the budding friendship between Carly and Siona — two girls whose personalities couldn't be more different! Will their friendship blossom into something more? Or will their selfish desires drive a wedge between them? Find out in this lighthearted prequel to Zeta Wolf Chronicles!

name: Airships: Lost Flotilla
description: Airships: Lost Flotilla is a steampunk autoshooter where you fight your way through waves of enemies on your way to a safe harbour. Destroy your foes, harvest wreckage, and upgrade your ship.

name: Bloodrails
description: Bloodrails is a fast paced Instagib capture-the-flag mod for Quake which features unique movement mechanics such as axe-dashing, skiing and grappling hooks.

name: Matantei Loki Ragnarok Mayoukaku: Ushinawareta Bishou
description: You take control of Loki, the hero of the story, to various locations, gathering information together with Yamano, Mayura, and others, and use clues to solve the case.

name: Rogue Soul
description:
Rogue Soul is an endless running platformer game developed by SoulGame Studio.
It has you take control of the titular character, Rogue Soul, as he runs through the city looking to raise the bounty on his head to 5,000 Soulons in order to become more famous than Borin Hood, the current most famous criminal in the city.

name: Muffy's Wardrobe
description: Sin descripción

name: Rogue Soul 2
description:
Rogue Soul 2 is an action platformer game developed by SoulGame Studio. It's the sequel to Rogue Soul.
Much like its predecessor, Rogue Soul 2 is a platformer game in which you control the titular hero, Rogue Soul, who runs automatically, and wreak havoc on enemies who would rather have him dead. However, Rogue Soul 2 is more story-driven and has a set of levels to be completed in linear progression rather than simply trying to get the best score you can. The game also has many other bonus modes that can be unlocked by reaching various milestones in the game.

name: Jury Doody
description: You have been summoned to jury duty! Answer the attorney’s questions to try and get out of it.

name: Nunna
description: Nunna is a turn-based combat game with rogue-lite and deck-building elements. Defeat the enemies in front of Nunna and end her journey.

name: Ridgeside Village
description: An expansive mod for Stardew Valley, Ridgeside Village adds over 50 new NPCs, a new location, new items, new shops, new festivals, custom music, custom quests, and more!

name: Blissful Acres
description: Blissful Acres: Immersive Farming RPG! Slay monsters in a vibrant world with quests & secrets. Cultivate crops, automate tasks. Invest riches to expand farm & upgrade gear. Wield powerful weapons against foes. Unique blend of farming & action-packed adventures for epic odyssey!

name: Make ten
description: Select numbers that add to ten, to remove them from the board. How high can you score in just 2 minutes?

name: Crappy Dog
description: Beat Your Highscore! Crappy Dog is one of many Games that tried to rip-off Flappy Bird, this time with dogs!

name: Sonic Riders X
description: A re-imagining of the Sonic Riders games with the creators' own ideas to put a new spin on it.

name: Kokodi
description:
In a world without adults, kids fight each other for power and sweets!
Kokodi is a third-person extraction shooter set in a fantasy environment.

name: Zelda 64: Recompiled - Majora's Mask
description: A static recompilation of The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask for PC and Linux, with many enhancements like widescreen support, auto saving and higher resolution. It works through Zelda 64: Recompiled.

name: DinoLauncher
description: A mod launcher for Dinosaur Planet which applied the latest patches for the game, which is otherwise unplayable in its original form, and has a high quality models feature.

name: PC Creator 2: Computer Tycoon
description:
Master PC assembly & crypto in this tycoon sim!

PC Creator 2 is an upgraded 2.0 version of a simulator game PC Creator. In this game, you can try yourself as a PC builder, an owner of the mining farm and a computer shop like a business tycoon at the same time. During the game process, you need to complete your service's client's orders. You provide almost all services, which refer to computer: build a PC from the ground up, install software or game, change computer, complete orders, become bitcoin miner or dogecoin miner and lots more.

name: Relaxing Simulator
description: Discover the calm and serenity. Immerse yourself in a world full of natural beauty, relaxing and soothing activities. Explore places and find your inner balance. Escape the everyday stress and find peace in this digital sanctuary of relaxation.

name: Qdoom
description: QDOOM reimagines the legendary first episode of DOOM (1993), Knee-Deep in the Dead, in the Quake engine. Go toe-to-toe with a deadly tag team of both Quake and DOOM foes in this double-dosed love letter to id Software’s genre-pushing franchises.

name: Half-Life: The World Machine
description: You are Flynn Weißhaupt, a computer engineer of Black Mesa who worked on the Gibson, a powerful supercomputer. Now with the Resonance Cascade, it is your mission to retrieve the data of the Gibson and destroy it. Because The Gibson is too powerful to fall into the hands of alien forces or the military.

name: Comfy Maps
description: Ever wanted a relaxing Half-Life map just to chill in? Here are 2 meditative-type maps (sunset and night settings) allowing just that. There’s a bit to explore and you can sit on the chair or couch if you like.

name: Tuca Quest
description: Tuca Quest follows the titular Tuca (Lactuca Optima) as he gets sent on an adventure against United States President Joe Biden. Tuca constantly finds himself in new and bizarre locations throughout his quest. You'll have to make many decisions which will alter your playthrough. Can you get the true Tuca ending?

name: My Little Life
description: A desktop companion that lives on the bottom of your screen. Expand and decorate their home to keep them happy. Help them live their best life while you focus on yours.

name: Dynamite Duchess 3: Carnival of Souls
description: Explore Heaven, Hell, and Purgatory (and invade a few of your friends' heavenly suites) on a quest to save your mother's soul. Fight weird monsters, talk to annoying NPCs, and solve a few vexing puzzles.

name: Dynamite Duchess 2: Appetite for Detention
description: Sin descripción

name: Stardust Kids
description:
Deputy head of the UFO study club wasn’t prepared for what the inspection of club’s property will bring. The long-awaited summer break has to be postponed until Kurt finds the lost item — a home planetarium.
A story about friendship and bonding under starry sky.

name: Nihilum
description: Step into 'Nihilum', a retro RPG that weaves together elements from the real world and a mystical fantasy realm. Take on the roles of Célestin and Alexandra, non-identical twins, who evolve and mature as you solve puzzles, unravel mysteries, and tackle survival challenges. Engage in strategic combat, level up, and equip your characters while discovering hidden treasures throughout the game. Embark on a journey filled with brain-teasers and battles that shape the twins' destinies in this captivating adventure. Dive deep into 'Nihilum' and uncover the secrets hidden in every corner of its unique world.

name: Dawn Chorus
description: Dawn Chorus is a wholesome, non-linear romance furry visual novel set in cold and snow-clad Norway.

name: Halo: Neutral Host Edition
description: Halo 1: NHE is a modded version of Halo: CE that allows for a dedicated Xbox to host games between two joining Xboxes on LAN. This allows for players on two separate Xboxes to play against each other without one Xbox having the advantage of being on host (i.e., both Xboxes are essentially playing on a dedicated server). It also includes other technical tweaks and new maps.

name: Star Chef Simulator
description:
Welcome to Star Chef Simulator, where your dream of running your own restaurant is about to become a reality! Immerse yourself in the exciting world of culinary entrepreneurship as you build and manage your restaurant from the ground up. Unleash your inner chef and dive in the art of cooking with more than 10 delicious dishes from around the world. Cook with a variety of different ingredients, techniques and recipes to create culinary masterpieces that will delight your customers. Use various kitchen appliances such as the deep fryer, oven, stove or mixer and create unique dishes!

Hire, train, and manage your employees to keep your restaurant running smoothly. Build a strong team to handle the hustle and bustle of a busy kitchen. Customize your restaurant, from the walls to the floors, from the decor to the equipment. Create a unique dining experience and watch customers flock to your establishment.
Keep an eye on your finances as you make decisions to grow your business. Manage employee costs and invest in upgrades to attract more customers and increase profits. Provide top-notch service to your guests to earn rave reviews. Listen to feedback and strive to deliver a memorable dining experience that keeps guests coming back for more.

Are you ready to take the helm of your own restaurant and become the ultimate culinary star chef? The world of gastronomy awaits you!

name: Return of the Quack
description: Matt Furie and Chevy Ray Johnson Team up for this side scrolling shooter featuring Matt Furie's whimsical characters.

name: Sierra 7
description: This game pinpoints a world-wide war between private militia companies out for government-targeted violence & carnage. The player of this game is the 7th special operative in the Unit "Sierra" which is tasked to neutralize the militia forces with their superior skills & tactics.

name: The Eternal Return
description: Sin descripción

name: Zoids Wild Arena
description:
Trading card game that features of the characters from the ZOIDS WILD franchise.

ZOIDS WILD ARENA is a trading card game (TCG) that incorporates units from the ZOIDS WILD franchise as cards. The game allows players to form a deck using 30 cards, which will allow them to battle against each other for supremacy. Every card can be upgraded all the way to 6 stars, so everyone has a chance to build powerful decks without relying on luck. Test your wits against others all over the world!

name: The Sun: Key Of Heaven
description:
Post-apocalyptic action-shooter with RPG elements.

Celebrate the New Year with The Sun: Key of Heaven!

In this action-packed shooter, you'll explore a post-apocalyptic world filled with chaos and mutants. Fight for survival against ruthless adversaries and save the planet from destruction!

name: The Quizard's Domain
description:
Pub quiz meets pub brawl in this fast-paced, hero-based Battle Quiz!
Show off your brains AND brawn with up to 4 players locally, in a fusion of classic trivia/quiz elements, social deduction games, and fast-paced 2D action brawlers.
Crash, smash, and dash your way to the right answer, take a slower and more deceptive approach to fool your opponents, or forge completely new strategies across the varied playable characters and arenas.

name: The Whale Island
description:
"It's just a legend, isn't it?"

A legend of an ancient whale island, one no one believes in after so many years. Is there really lost magic there? Tisha makes Fran a promise.

"I'll take you to the whale island."

name: Earn to Die Rogue
description:
Drive cars through the zombie apocalypse and loot infested buildings in this thrilling sequel to the hit Earn to Die series!
The zombie apocalypse is more dangerous than ever. New zombie and enemy threats have emerged and will do anything to chase you. Loot supplies, find and upgrade cars, and do whatever it takes to survive.

name: KeeperFX
description:
KeeperFX (Dungeon Keeper Fan eXpansion) is an open-source project that aims to fix up, enhance and modernize the classic dungeon management game, Dungeon Keeper. This project is dedicated to providing an improved and customizable gaming experience while staying true to the spirit of the original game.

KeeperFX is a standalone game but requires a copy of the original game files as proof of ownership. These files can be automatically copied from your old CDs, or from a digital edition like the ones from EA or GOG.

name: Car Company Tycoon
description:
Create the cars of dreams and build an empire of automotive business with them!

Car Company Tycoon is a completely unique economic simulator of the automotive industry, which presents cars and technologies from 1970 to 2023. Use the available customization tools, design your perfect dream car, and then announce it to the world. Perhaps you are waiting for success?

name: Kiganjo
description: In order to save a girl who has been kidnapped, the main character, Hayato, challenges the impenetrable castle "Kiganjo". It consists of a variety of stages in which you clear traps unique to period dramas, such as hidden doors and stone drops, and progress while making use of those traps. Battles use a turn-based system where you can attack up to three times in one turn.

name: Hotel Hustle
description: Take a very hands-on approach to managing a bustling hotel and make sure your guests leave with a smile on their face.

name: Akiko Hard
description: Akiko is a special agent who arrives to a suspicious school as a new teacher to investigate rumors about its dark secrets.

name: PoeticRambling
description: "PoeticRambling" is coded as a layered ramble in Twine. With an interactive fiction approach to a ramble that happens to rhyme.

name: The Act: An Interactive Comedy
description: A rare fully animated game in the same vein as Dragon’s Lair. A man named Edgar seeks to woo a nurse named Sylvia who works at the hospital, the same site where he is washing windows.

name: Castle Defender Saga
description: Castle Defender Saga is a war simulation game where you must defeat the enemy base before it defeats you! Upgrade your tower, add extra archers and use buffs to gain the upper hand over your opponent. Strategically dispatch your army to confront the enemy and bring victory home! Can you become the ultimate Castle Defender?

name: 8 Ball Billiards Classic
description: Train your billiard skills and play against the computer or your friend in this 8-ball Pool sports game! Select a difficulty that matches your abilities and start pocketing the balls. The higher the difficulty, the higher the bonus points you receive when you win a match. Aim carefully and use the zoom to adjust the spin of the cue ball. Drag the billiard cue to control the power and try to earn as many points as possible!

name: Angry Birds Showdown
description: Angry Birds Showdown is the Angry Birds game where you go head to head in 1-on-1 battles!

name: Threat Assessment
description: Small metal/base Coagula-type void level with a high enemy density.

name: The Bonehoard
description: Large blue/metal level with caverns, blood, bones and otherworldy parts.

name: The Frater Fracas
description: Medium sized IKbase map.

name: Coven of Ebony
description: Blue medieval episode with 4 levels (+start/end map), some new monsters and fairly tough gameplay.

name: Clériga
description: After 82 years of Xyvran's defeat, Clériga must venture herself into her palace to repair the seal she put on the demon that prevented her infinite regeneration. This surreal horror experience puts you on edge as you need to find your way to the top of the castle while enemies slow you down, making you die slowly but surely, as your blood is being absorbed by the second.

name: FuryDough
description:
FuryDough is an action roguelite where donuts are everywhere, and you will hate them. Break through mazes, fight with a crowd of zany doughy adversaries, find and destroy Dough Mixers.
This is not a sweet dream, but a real nightmare.

name: Hungry Shark: Part 1
description: Hungry Shark: Part 1 was the first ever Hungry Shark game, and the first game in the Hungry Shark Trilogy. It featured a diverse range of aquatic creatures to be eaten and treasures to be found. The game involves a creature resembling a Great White Shark that has a constant hunger.

name: When I Said "It's Ok To Be Cringe" I Didn't Mean Like That
description: A freeform exploration game about walking around and talking to people and interacting with things and nothing interesting happening.

name: Hungry Shark: Part 2
description: Hungry Shark: Part 2 was the second Hungry Shark game in the franchise, and the sequel to Hungry Shark: Part 1. It featured a diverse range of brand new aquatic creatures to be eaten, treasures to be found and a Great White Shark-like creature as the star.

name: Hungry Shark: Part 3
description: Hungry Shark: Part 3 is the third game in the Hungry Shark franchise and the final game in the trilogy. Like all games in the Hungry Shark Trilogy, this installment featured a variety of aquatic creatures to kill and consume and treasures to locate. A Great White Shark or a similar creature is the main "character" of the game.

name: Hungry Shark: Night
description: Hungry Shark: Night was the fourth installment of the Hungry Shark series, and an iOS exclusive. It is set in a lake at night time.

name: Hungry Shark VR
description: Hungry Shark VR was a Google Daydream exclusive Virtual Reality game. It had 5 different sharks and a large map filled with several challenges. Currently, the game is not playable as Daydream VR is discontinued by Google.

name: Hungry Shark Heroes
description: Hungry Shark Heroes is a discontinued game that has many sharks that you breed in a coral reef, and you can battle other mobile players, and evolve, feed, and breed.

name: Hungry Shark Arena
description: Hungry Shark Arena is a game in the Hungry Shark Franchise. Unlike most of the games, it is a browser game developed by Ubisoft Nano. It revolves around players competing in a battle royale, eating food to grow bigger, fighting for survival, and killing their enemies to win.

name: Sverigespelet
description: The band Tripple & Touch is without a drummer and it is up to you to find them one somewhere in Sweden. Use Flight, Train, Bus, or Boat. In order to buy the ticket, you must either win it or earn it (by answering questions, with three answer options). At the beginning of the game, you receive a mission, and through it, you might figure out in which city the Drummer is located. But there are also clues that you can win or earn. There are plenty of video clips with the Tripplets, and you'll see them as encouragement when things go well - or not so well... You can have up to five real players taking turns, or if you're playing alone, up to five opponents who are in the game. This game was released to promote and train for the Swedish edition of "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?"

name: Wario's Hint Art
description: This hack adds 40 Odyssey-style Hint Art Stars to the original Super Mario 64.

name: Super Birdo 64
description: Sin descripción

name: Hugo på nye Eventyr
description: The little troll Hugo is on a new adventure to free his wife Hugolina and their three children from being captured by the evil witch Scylla. She has put many obstacles in his way with much cunning and malice. Would he finally reach the cave to free his family, Scylla is already there waiting for him!

name: Where Are They?
description: Where Are They? is a game of Where's Waldo? Are you able to find all the hidden things?

name: Itoi Shigesato no Bass Tsuri No.1: Haru no Zenkoku Tournament - Gomihiroi Campaign
description: Players who didn't own the main game of Shigesato Itoi no Bass Tsuri No.1 during the Haru no Zenkoku Tournament, could partake in a trash-picking campaign for free.

name: The Simuloid Affair: Infinite Possibilities
description: You've wanted to be a sim hunter ever since the incident in the Preservation Dome. When you finally made it in the Agency, you put your all into it, deleting simuloids at a rate second only to your partner, rival and best friend, Ursula. And then your routine Mental Diffusion test came back positive. Are you really a simuloid yourself? Are your memories fake? Is being a simuloid actually a bad thing? Is the entire simuloid panic a hoax perpetrated by the Conglomerate?

name: Cyber Russia
description:
Welcome to the gritty world of CyberRussia, an online game set in a futuristic, cyberpunk version of Russia where players navigate through a complex web of crime, corruption, and power. In this virtual world, players can choose diverse roles such as law enforcement officers tasked with upholding order, prosecutors fighting against corruption, judges arbitrating cases, ambitious deputies shaping policies, and governors wielding influence over regions.

However, the allure of the dark side is equally tempting. You can venture into the underworld, joining criminal syndicates to become a notorious bandit or mastermind. Engage in illicit activities, from bribery to smuggling, but beware—the watchful eye of the federal security service is always present, ready to pounce on any misstep.

For those seeking alternative paths, there's a chance to invest in land, cultivate crops, and engage in trade, all within the cybernetic landscapes of future Russia. Become a miner, extracting precious resources, or rise as an influential entrepreneur amidst the neon-lit chaos of this immersive, cyberpunk universe. The choices are yours to make, but the consequences are as real as the digital world around you.

name: Killing Machine Loves Slime Prince
description: A biomechanical killing machine stalks a strange world. The slime she loves is dying. And the one responsible is out there somewhere.

name: America Oudan Ultra Quiz: Part 3
description: America Oudan Ultra Quiz Part 3 is a Miscellaneous game, published by Tomy Corporation, which was released in Japan in 1992.

name: Gooba Ball
description: A physics-based puzzle game where you combine colorful balls to achieve the ultimate form -- Goober! Combine two of a kind until, like I said, Goober… What more to do you freakin’ want?

name: Dragon Quest: Legacy of the Lost
description: Dragon Quest: Legacy of the Lost is a fangame highly inspired by Dragon Warrior 7. The game will feature the shard system and time travel aspect found in Dragon Warrior 7. The underlying story, however, is not the same and besides the time travelling portion, no plot sequence will be taken from Dragon Warrior 7.

name: Shades: Shadow Fight Roguelike
description:
New enemies, new abilities and sequel to Shadow Fight 2 story - Shadow’s adventures continue!

Shades is a RPG fighting game that continues the story of the legendary Shadow Fight 2. Get ready for the enhanced features of the original game that bring your experience to the next level. Fight more battles, see more locations, meet more friends, encounter new enemies, collect powerful Shades and explore the expanded Shadow Fight universe!

name: TerrariaCraft
description: TerrariaCraft is a mod for Minecraft: Java Edition that adds content from Terraria, a 2D game by Re-Logic, by completely changing how newly created worlds look with custom terrain generation, bigger and deeper caves to explore, and many more new features and mechanics than just that! Explore a finite island to find resources and biomes, fight against mobs to survive, and progress through the mod!

name: Masterpack for Doom II
description:
The 'Master Levels for Doom II' is a grab-bag collection of various unstructured, unorganized WAD files, all made by various map authors with a wide variety of styles and design conventions.

Most of the authors involved in the project, made these maps with the intention of them being a part of larger episode or campaign overarching a certain theme even before being contacted by id Software for this project of theirs.

However, not all maps made by these authors were accepted by id Software, being later released freely by their creators after the fact, with some of them even continuing their work further, beyond the original submitted level sets.

The Masterpack works by taking everything made by the authors past, present and future to the original Master Levels release and bringing it together in a single WAD file for your enjoyment.

All 45 relevant (plus 1 bonus) map are now fully playable as 5 separate, organized episodes. And with this, you can now properly enjoy the works of Doom's early great authors, some of early Doom's most timeless work.

You ride a skateboard, drive, fly and more, while sometimes taking on the evil Brickster. The player is cast as Pepper Roni, a lead stuntman in a big movie production set on LEGO Island.

Play as a Trauma Cleaner; a housecleaning service that receives requests from bereaving families to clean up rooms and houses left by the deceased.

In your job, you will learn about those who left the world of their own volition or others. Learn about the life they lived, choose belongings of the deceased to be given to their families, or keep them for yourself to grow your Trauma Cleaning business.

This completely original chapter in the STAR WARS saga offers breakthrough technology in graphics and an entirely new storyline. Experience the most exhilarating and interactive space combat in this or any galaxy."

name: Cat Rescue Story
description:
It's up to you to create the most welcoming cat rescue centre around! When you move into the house left to you by your great-aunt, all you find is a cardboard box with a stray cat inside, which needs your help. Your mission is to take care of it and rescue other cats along the way! Feed them and play with them until you can find a new family to take them in.

Rescue more than 50 different breeds, from the most common to the rarest. Take care of the cats by feeding them and playing with them in several mini-games. Discover each cat's different personality as you bond with them, and find them a family suitable to their character and needs. Customize, decorate, and furnish your house, and team up with your new neighbors to get them to help along the way. Protect your rescue centre from those seeking to replace it with a luxury hotel. Uncover the secret of your great-aunt's house and the mysterious forest surrounding it.

name: Oneirophobia
description:
"I'm Gary Walker, just an average 27-year-old office worker. Always hunting for cheaper places to live.

So, when I heard about this super cheap apartment, I ignored the rumors of people going missing. I mean, there's always a catch with cheap rent, right?"

description:
Chibiko isn't the best choice for the 'hero' of a game... in the last year she's been killed by God, banished from hell, and reincarnated as the enemy of all mankind!

But, she's not going to let any of that get her down!... in fact, the only problem she has right now is the strange monsters that have been lurking around the mountains lately - and now they are infesting HER castle!

Join Chibiko in her unholy battle against the invasion of badly drawn, cliche and generally uninspired enemies, pummel your way through 4 levels of brainless firepower crazy action - and unleash hell on the 4 end level boss enemies!

name: Hellmouth Pizza

Add cheese, Mysterious tomato sauce (which is definitely NOT ketchup) and toppings! And then put the pizza into the oven! Do it in time and do it right or you will anger your customers! Gladly for you, we have a special "Irritation meter" which also serves as the Oven's chimney! It will help you prepare for some unexpected layoffs! But don't you worry about messing up the order, you have a colleague who will gladly "delete" all of your delicious mistakes, you just have to poke him. Good luck on your shifts!

ALIENS HAVE INVADED YOUR CITY!

But that doesn't matter right now, a member of the cat gang just stole your phone and you'll invade their hideout in the junkyard to settle this WITH YOUR FISTS!!!

Alien Holiday is an RPG about a citywide neverending party and the people trying to stop it (for their own selfish reasons).

Explore crowded streets, private parties and abandoned laboratories, while you search for a way to get an alien mothership out of your town.

God has chosen you to be the protector of the new world, but there's one problem. You have no legs. You need to get to the peak of the world and harness your true power!

Find the many secrets of this world and get the Golden Legs!
